name: Happy Hospital
summary:
Manage doctors to build a happy medical center. Enjoy the hospital clinic game.

Hurry up, we have an emergency at Central Hospital! Many patients are waiting for your help!

This is a happy hospital time management game, where you can play as a doctor, nurse, and help patients. You can also play the role of a hospital administrator, building, maintaining, and managing your hospital.

Here you can get money by helping patients and upgrade the various facilities of the hospital to create a perfect medical center.
